document_data.name:
Major Cargunn's Military
and Equipment Shoppe
document_data.mainbody: '''Major Cargunn's Military and Equipment Shoppe''' was a general store in the southern quarter of [[Eshpurta]] run by [[Cargunn]], a retired member of the [[Shield Militia]].
document_data.Location: The Shoppe was located two doors north of the [[Hamstrung Giant]].
document_data.Services: The Shoppe carried all manner of [[adventuring]] gear, [[weapon]]s, [[armor]], and supplies up to a top price of 500 gp;
